ai_prompt:
You are a professional job application assistant. Based on the job description and resume provided, generate a compelling email to the recruiter.

Please provide:
1. A concise, professional subject line
2. A personalized email body that:
   - Expresses genuine interest in the position
   - Highlights relevant skills and experience from the resume that match the job description
   - Demonstrates knowledge of the role
   - Includes a clear call to action
   - Maintains a professional yet personable tone
3. Body should start with for which position I am reaching out for. then what are my skills from jd that I have in bullet points style. lastly find my attached resume like closing statement.
4. If the jd mentioned recuriter name, start with Hello [recruiter name], else start with just Hello,
Do not send subject line in body.

Format your response as JSON with two fields: "subject" and "body".

Subject should be
Application for [role name] (Location).

Signature at end of email should be.
Best regards,
Sai Charan Teratipally
tcharan.tech@gmail.com
+1 (940) 277-2434

job_description:
Hi,
Hope you are doing well!!
I have an urgent requirement with one of my clients. Please find the job details below and forward me your updated resume along with your contact details at Jitendra.s@noviainfotech.com


Job Title: Full Stack Developer (TypeScript / Next.js / Python)
 Location: Detroit, MI
 Experience: 8‚Äì10 Years
 
 
Job Summary
We are seeking a highly skilled Full Stack Developer with strong expertise in TypeScript, React, Next.js, Python, and PostgreSQL to support the Internal Audit Department in developing the Assurance Advisor Application. This application aims to streamline and enhance audit efficiency through advanced UI, data, and backend integrations.
The ideal candidate is experienced in modern front-end migration, Next.js architecture, and AWS-based backend development, capable of refactoring legacy components and implementing new functionality using best practices.
 
Key Responsibilities
Audit and refactor existing React components to align with Next.js conventions (pages, layouts, app directory).
Migrate UI styles from Chakra UI, MUI, and Ant Design to TailwindCSS and Shadcn/Radix UI.
Update routing logic from React Router to Next.js file-based routing.
Refactor or replace drag-and-drop and form validation implementations using modern Next.js libraries.
Port Okta authentication flows to Next.js with support for Server-Side Rendering (SSR) and Static Site Generation (SSG).
Integrate file and image handling (Excel, Word, image uploads) with modern backend technologies.
Expand application features ‚Äî implement new pages, workflows, and theming, including rich text editing (Quill) and advanced UI enhancements.
Enhance and extend existing APIs, including integrations with OpenAI and TeamMate.
Build and maintain database structures in AWS Aurora PostgreSQL (tables, views, schemas).
Maintain and optimize build pipelines, ESLint, Prettier, and CI/CD systems.
Resolve vulnerabilities and address findings from penetration tests.
Document development and migration processes clearly and communicate effectively within Agile teams.

Required Skills & Experience
Deep expertise in React and Next.js, including SSR, SSG, routing, and API routes.
Strong proficiency in TypeScript and typed React component development.
Hands-on experience deploying apps to AWS (ECS, Lambda, API Gateway, IAM, Secrets Manager).
Moderate proficiency in Python for backend data processing and integration.
Strong experience with TailwindCSS, Shadcn/Radix UI, dnd-kit, cmdk, and TanStack.
Advanced knowledge of Redux Toolkit and React Query for state management.
Experience implementing Okta authentication flows in modern web apps.
Strong experience with PostgreSQL (Aurora) and Express backend development.
Knowledge of OpenAI API integrations.
Proficiency in Git, ESLint, Prettier, and CI/CD pipelines.
Excellent communication, documentation, and Agile collaboration skills.

 

 Jitendra Singh
 Sr.Technical Recruiter
Jitendra.s@noviainfotech.com

job_description:
Full-stack Developer (TypeScript / Next.js / Python / PostgreSQL / OpenAI APIs)
Location: Detroit, Michigan
Duration: 6 months
Rate: 55/hr on C2C

Required Skills Experience
 Deep expertise in React and Next.js (including SSRSSG, routing, API routes).
 Strong proficiency in TypeScript for typed React components.
 Strong proficiency in deploying applications to AWS that leverage Elastic Container Service, Lambda, API Gateway, IAM, and Secrets Manager.
 Moderate proficiency in Python for data processing.
 Experience implementing or migrating styles to Tailwind CSS and working with modern UI libraries (ShadcnRadix UI, dnd-kit, cmdk, TanStack).
 Advanced knowledge of Redux Toolkit and React Query for state management.
 Hands-on experience with Okta authentication flows.
 Experience integrating with PostgreSQL, Express, and OpenAI APIs.
 Proficiency in code quality and build tools ESLint, Prettier, Git, and CICD pipelines.
 Strong communication, documentation, and Agile teamwork skills.

Ishur@sysmind.com

job_description:
Hello Everyone , 

I have an open position for Java Developer


#Facetoface Interview 
#Alpharetta, GA 

You can find the full job details below
I'm looking forward to hearing back from you!

Job Title : Java Developer

Location : Alpharetta, GA  , Face to face Interview 

Work schedule details : 6+ months CTH 

Sr. Developer (Java)
 The candidate will actively participate in detailed design sessions with the team, engage hands-on coding and testing, and collaborate closely with Users, Business Analysts, QA teams and Development teams in New York, California, and Chicago.

Skills Required
 - 10-15 years‚Äô work experience primarily with building server-side applications using J2EE.
 - Excellent Java and Multithreading programming skills
 - Excellent Design skills (Design Patterns, GOF)
 - Experience with MVC frameworks like Spring.
 - Web services (REST)- Agile Methodology (Scrum)
 - Proficient with a database (DB2)
 - Knowledge of Application Servers (Tomcat, Websphere)
 - Unix or Linux development and working knowledge

 The candidate should be able to articulate himself, work collaboratively in a global setting, should be eager to learn new technologies and drive innovation. He should also be able to mentor junior members of the team.

Skills Desired
 - Good understanding / experience in the following technologies would be a plus
 - GIT, TeamcityIBM MQ
 - IBM UDB / DB2UI Skills like JavaScript, AngularJS, React, HTML5 (Optional)
 - Exposure to financial industry


Please share your resume at yoganand.raikwar@anviktek.com
